Do you often hear compliments addressed to you, and unselfish and sincere ones?

Do your lines "creep" up when writing?
Do you think most people can be trusted or should you be careful when interacting with others?
Most people can be trusted.
You need to be careful when interacting with others.
Could you say that people tend to be useful to others more often than not, or do they only think about themselves?
They strive to be useful to others.
They only think about themselves.
Do you think most people would try to deceive you if they had the opportunity, or would they behave honestly?
They would have behaved honestly.
They would have tried to cheat if they had the opportunity.
This is message text

High degree of stress: The results indicate a high level of stress. It is recommended to seek the help of a qualified professional, such as a psychologist or psychiatrist, to receive support and advice on stress management.

Average stress level: Your answers indicate an average stress level. This may be a sign that your stress level is within the normal range, but it\'s still worth paying attention to your emotional states. Try to find ways to deal with stress, such as regular physical activity, meditation, deep breathing, or counseling with a psychologist.

Low stress: Your responses indicate a low level of stress. This is good, but it must be remembered that stress can change over time, and it is important to continue to take care of your emotional and psychological well-being. Regular rest, healthy eating, maintaining social connections, and time management can help maintain your well-being.

You are convinced that you have a personal charm. It seems that this is the case, but in some situations you should be more self-critical of yourself and pay more attention not to yourself, but to the people around you.

There is no doubt that you can be called a charming person. You are pleasant in communication, you have a sense of self-worth. You will not change your beliefs and character just to make someone adore you.

You are not everyone\'s favorite just because you keep the charm to yourself. This is probably because you are a very indecisive person, because of your lack of confidence in your own abilities, you are not able to convince others of your rightness, even if the truth is on your side.

You lack charm primarily because you don\'t love yourself. Look in the mirror more often and learn to notice your advantages. The shortcomings that can be corrected, correct, and which cannot be changed, turn into advantages, into your "highlight". When communicating with others, try to keep a sense of self-worth
